body:
Hi guys :D
You know when you are adding someone to skype, and need their username / email?
Is there any option that let you edit your username? I accidentally made it my phone number when I made the profile...

Thanks! ;D
body_tagged:

title: Skype >_<

replies.body: You can't change your username afaik, recently Skype changed it so you can't get a username when you register either.
replies.body_tagged: You can't change your username afaik, recently Skype changed it so you can't get a username when you register either.

replies.body: Ye I noticed it now. I just made a new email called ... ... and then my username became live:namehere.namehere :3
replies.body_tagged: Ye I noticed it now. I just made a new email called ... ... and then my username became live:namehere.namehere :3
